idea: WASTENOT LTD is a brand by KAUTILYA RE-POLYMERS PVT. LTD which plans to create a Pan Indian Ocean Bound Plastic Waste Up-cycling Company, rooted into Innovative – Lateral – Breakthrough Technology/processes. Generating wealth from waste through effective source collection of dry waste, sorting of recyclable plastics, recycling into Virgin grade equivalent recycled plastic granules & moulding into end application commodity products of high value and demand
name: KAUTILYA RE-POLYMERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at, Farm 2 Fam, have the vision of growing locally the fruits that are currently imported into India such as berries, cherries, avocadoes, etc. These fruits are expensive in price due the import from different countries and therefore affordable to only a niche elite class of the population today. Our vision, is to grow such fruits in India as per international standards and quality and make them accessible to majority of the Indian population. These fruits will be sold in our own brand enabling the consumers to check the traceability and origin of these fruits. In addition to fresh, we will also be working on developing value added products like jams, sauces, chocolates, etc. from these fruits to enable the customers to eat the fruits in different formats.
name: FARM 2 FAM INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We can help you ship goods warehouse to warehouse. We handle freight, customs clearance, transportation, warehousing etc to give you a seamless experience. Forwarding, Customs Clearance, Transportation. End-to-End logistics.

idea: Kaladisha is a video streaming websites that offers thousands of hours of premium, exclusive and original content from leading Producers and Publishers. It’s a one-stop websites for some of the best Kala. The platform lays focus on Exclusive Original Content with emphasis on high-quality Hindi and Regional Languages. The language range includes everything from Malayalam, Tamil, Bengali, Punjabi, Bhojpuri, and etc. Kaladisha will offer consumers more than 20 original shows and over 50,000 hours of Premium Content across languages. Large collection of Kala and Short Videos. Watch your favourite content on the go anytime, anywhere.
name: KALADISHA PRIVATE LIMITED
